title: Dancin' in the Moonlight
description: Did Tala Wild's dance for her immortal man really work? After that many margaritas it's hard to tell if howling at the moon was the best way to find a guy. But is Devlin the perfect mix of man and animal? After the ribbing her friends gave her about wanting a lover like a wolf she's a bit cautious especially when she finds him naked in the wolfs pen of her zoo.
author: Beverly Rae
